text: Does it even fit me? I wonder...

(These clothes are fitting for the special existence
that only a charming girl can become......)

── Is there any way Fuyu, the exact opposite of that, 
can properly wear this?
......Something like that, is a foolish question.

I've decided to wear it,
so there's nothing to do but make it suit me.
It'll be alright. If it's Fuyu, it'll be alright...
── I definitely won't let anyone see me struggling.
